definition: in or at this place, the present location, being here now
details:
adverb
- in or at this place
= example: in or at this place
- to this place (especially toward the speaker)
= example: to this place (especially toward the speaker)
= synonyms: hither
- in this circumstance or respect or on this point or detail
= example: in this circumstance or respect or on this point or detail
- at this time
= synonyms: moment, here and now, present moment
noun
- the present location
adjective
- being here now
